In England, in the seven days to 02 April, there were 383,149 new confirmed cases (677.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 March, there were 496,286 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 23% (113,137 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 April is 18,108,626 (32,022.2 cases per 100,000 population).
